turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could you order me some pizza from that place we ordered from last?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure! I believe it was monicals we ordered from. Does that sound right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: YES! That was it!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok great! what would like me to order and for how many?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: can you see if there are any specials going on?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes there are some specials. Family pleasers are $20 each

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: awesome! those come with drinks right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yes it comes with a 2L

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: ok. what kinds of soda do they have?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: coke products

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: even better!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: how many people are joining you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: there will be about 10 of us. how many will a 16" feed?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: let me check.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: ok

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: a 16" will feed 5-6 people.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: ok what kind of dressing do they have for the salad.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the most popular are their famous french and ranch.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: ok lets do 3 family pleasers. 1 sausage 1 pepporoni and 1 everything.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok got. do you want breadsticks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: how many do you get?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 5 or 10 pack

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: ok lets get 2 10 packs

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. what do you want to drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 1 cokes and 1 sprite

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: how long do you think it will be?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I will get that called in now and get back with you on a more accurate time.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: great thanks so much

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I will have it to you in about an hour.
